name: 今日竞技场对局
query: SELECT count(*) FROM battle_history WHERE current_date = date_trunc('day', start_time);

name: 今日竞技场拔线对局
query: SELECT count(*) FROM battle_history WHERE current_date = date_trunc('day', start_time) and (userscorea < 0 or userscoreb < 0) and type = 'athletic';

name: 今日竞技场活跃用户
query: SELECT count(DISTINCT A) FROM (SELECT usernamea FROM battle_history WHERE current_date = date_trunc('day', start_time) AND type = 'athletic' UNION SELECT usernameb FROM battle_history WHERE current_date = date_trunc('day', start_time) AND type = 'athletic') as A;
